data.title: Giulio Brugnoni - Men's Swimming & Diving
data.meta_description:
Giulio Brugnoni - 

	NCAA CHAMPION-100 YARD BACKSTROKE
	NCAA ALL-AMERICAN (50 Free, 200 Medley Relay)
	CSCAA ALL-AMERICAN (50 Free, 100 Back, 200 Back, 100 Fly,
data.text:
2020-2021 Delta State Men's Swimming & Diving Roster

Choose a Player:

Elisabetta Zengaro

Giulio Brugnoni

Height 6-0

Class Senior

Hometown Perugia, Italy

Prev School Liceo Scientifico Galileo Galilei

Bio

Historical

Biography

NCAA CHAMPION-100 YARD BACKSTROKE

NCAA ALL-AMERICAN (50 Free, 200 Medley Relay)

CSCAA ALL-AMERICAN (50 Free, 100 Back, 200 Back, 100 Fly, 400 Free Relay, 200 Medley Relay)

NSISC CHAMPION (50 Free, 100 Free, 100 Back, 200 & 400 Medley Relay)

CSCAA HONORABLE MENTION ALL-AMERICAN (200 Free Relay)

2020-21 NSISC SCHOLAR ATHLETE

2019-20 NSISC SCHOLAR ATHLETE

2018-19 NSISC SCHOLAR ATHLETE

2017-18 NSISC SCHOLAR ATHLETE

2019-20

Finished third in the 50 freestyle with a time of 19.73 at the NCAA Championships

Helped lead the 200 medley relay team to a third place finish

Qualified second in the preliminary of the 100 butterfly before the meet was canceled due to the COVID-19 pandemic

Swimmer of the Year in the NSISC

Won the 50 freestyle for the second straight year

Helped lead the 200 medley relay team to a first place finish and an NSISC record time of 1:27.65

Third straight NSISC title in the 100 backstroke..set the NSISC, pool, and DSU record with a time of 46.23 in that event

Member of winning 400 medley relay team

Third straight win in the 100 backstroke

Won the NSISC title in the 100 freestyle

ACCOLADES:

NSISC SCHOLAR ATHLETE

NSISC SWIMMER OF THE YEAR

NSISC CHAMPION (50 Free, 100 Fly, 100 Back, 200 & 400 Medley Relay)

NSISC RUNNER-UP (400 Free Relay)

NCAA ALL-AMERICAN (National Runner-Up - 50 Free, 100 Fly, 200 Back, 200 & 400 Medley Relay)

NCAA HONORABLE MENTION ALL-AMERICAN (100 Back)

Came in second in the 50 freestyle and set a school record with a time of 19.71 at the NCAA Championships

Helped lead the 200 medley relay team to a school record (1:26.89) and a third place finish

Finished fifth in the 100 butterfly

Member of the 400 medley relay team that came in fourth

Came in ninth in the 100 backstroke and set a school record (46.24)

Came in fifth in the 200 backstroke

Swimmer of the Year at the NSISC Championships

Won the 50 freestyle

Helped lead the 200 medley relay team to a win and a school record time (1:41.02)

Repeated as the winner of the 100 butterfly

Part of 400 medley relay team that won the NSISC title with an NSISC record of 3:13.45

Repeated as the winner of the 100 backstroke

Placed third in the 200 backstroke

Part of 400 freestyle relay that came in second

ACCOLADES:

NSISC SWIMMER OF THE YEAR

NSISC CHAMPION (100 Fly, 100 & 200 Back, 200 & 400 Medley Relay, 400 Free Relay)

NSISC RUNNER-UP (50 Free)

NCAA ALL-AMERICAN (National Runner-Up - 100 Back, 100 Fly, 200 Free Relay)

NCAA HONORABLE MENTION ALL-AMERICAN (200 & 400 Medley Relay, 400 Free)

Finished second in the 100 backstroke and set a school record at 46.48 at the NCAA Championships

Finished in sixth in the 100 butterfly

Part of 400 freestyle relay that came in 10th

Helped lead the 200 freestyle relay to fourth and the 400 medley relay team to 12th

Part of 200 medley relay team that came in 12th

Swimmer of the Year in the NSISC at the NSISC Championships

NSISC runner-up in the 50 freestyle

Part of the 400 freestyle relay team that won

Helped lead the 200 medley relay team to a win

Won the 100 butterfly

Part of 400 medley relay team that won

Won the 100 backstroke and set a new NSISC record at 46.74

Won the 200 backstroke

Attended Liceo Scientifico Galileo Galilei

Second place at Italian junior championship in 50/100 backstroke and 50 fly

Born in Pergugia, Italy

Son of Mauro Brugnoni and Ilaria Volpini

Has one sister, Ginevra Maria and one brother, Gregorio

Majoring in business management
